title: Content Intelligence Web Element

xdm:id.title: Element Id
xdm:id.description: The unique ID of the web element.

xdm:modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The type of the element's component.

xdm:title.title: Title
xdm:title.description: The title of the web element

xdm:template.title: Template
xdm:template.description: The path to the element's template

xdm:language.title: Language
xdm:language.description: The language of of the web element

xdm:asset.title: Asset
xdm:asset.description: The asset referred by the web element.

xdm:linkUrl.title: LinkUrl
xdm:linkUrl.description: The URL the element links to.

xdm:tags.title: Web element tags
xdm:tags.description: The element tags and their confidence score in subunitary value format. A confidence score of 1 means the tag is predefined. Other values represent predicted confidence.

xdm:parentId.title: Parent ID
xdm:parentId.description: The ID of the parent webelement.

xdm:activeItem.title: Active item
xdm:activeItem.description: The active item name, usually for container components.

xdm:expandedItems.title: Expanded items
xdm:expandedItems.description: The expanded items mainly for collapsible elements (accordion)
